scripts.start: node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/cli.js -p 'yarn ava test/massive.test.js --tap' -p 'yarn ava test/skipping.test.js --tap'
scripts.tap: node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/cli.js -p 'yarn ava test/skipping.test.js --tap'  -p 'yarn ava test/massive.test.js --tap' -t
